if self.autorotationspeed then self.facing = self.facing + elapsed * self.autorotationspeed self:SetFacing(self.facing) end if self.slideshow and self.models and #self.models>0 then local min,max=min,max self.slideshowelapsed = self.slideshowelapsed + elapsed
if self.slideshowelapsed>self.slideshow then self.slideshowno = self.slideshowno + 1 if self.slideshowno>#self.models then self.slideshowno=1 end self:SetDisplayInfo(self.models[self.slideshowno]) self.slideshowelapsed = 0 end end
